In October, a group of European Parliament members had visited the disputed Kashmir region.

articles.title: Aussie has spent 53 years fighting fires, including his own
articles.description: Doug Schutz started volunteering with the Rural Fire Service in Australia's New South Wales state some 53 years ago, at the age of 13
